spatial_accuracy.notes: Layout topology is good, all rooms present and adjacencies correct. Wall geometry is largely accurate, though some minor misalignments exist. Doors are mostly well-placed, but one is missing and swing directions are inconsistent. Windows are present but placement is sometimes off and sizes are not consistently proportional. Dimensional scaling seems consistent overall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Good cutaway view, all interior walls visible. No missing structural elements or hallucinated rooms. UI/Annotation Cleanliness is 0 due to text in the 2D plan appearing in the 3D render. Presentation Context is 0 due to the presence of an artificial ground plane with shadows.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most major furniture pieces are present. Dining table, sofas, beds, kitchen and bathroom fixtures are included. Placement is generally accurate but some items are slightly off-position or scaled disproportionately.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent geometry style, using low-poly simplified forms and flat-shaded solid colors with no textures. Lighting is soft and ambient with minimal shadows. True isometric projection with good camera composition.

detected_errors.description: One door missing between Hall and Laundry room. Another door between Hall and Bathroom has incorrect swing direction.
Windows in Kitchen/Dining and Living Room are not proportional to their counterparts in the 2D plan, appearing smaller and sometimes higher. Some window placements are slightly off.
Text from the 2D floor plan 'Nordic Homes' is present in the 3D render.
Ground plane with shadows present, violating specification for floating/isolated model.
Small round table in Living Room is missing. Bed in Bedroom 2 is slightly too large for the room, causing clearance issues. Toilet placement in Bathroom is slightly moved.

summary: The 3D render accurately translates the 2D floor plan's spatial arrangement and structural elements with high geometric and aesthetic quality, despite minor issues with window proportionality, a missing door and text hallucination from the source. The rendering style is compliant with low-poly, flat-shaded specifications.
